import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update a vendor"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/invoicing/vendors/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing vendor's details. The VendorId in the request body must match the id in the URL path for the update to succeed.

**Prerequisites**
1. **id** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/invoicing/vendors](/docs/api/invoicing/get-all-vendors) to list vendors. Extract `Item[].VendorId` from the response.

**Workflow Example**
1. List vendors: [GET /api/v1.0/invoicing/vendors](/docs/api/invoicing/get-all-vendors) â†’ identify target vendor.
2. Get current details: [GET /api/v1.0/invoicing/vendors/\{id\}](/docs/api/invoicing/get-vendor-by-id) for the current state.
3. Update vendor: [POST /api/v1.0/invoicing/vendors/\{id\}](/docs/api/invoicing/update-vendor) with modified vendor object.

**Important**: Include `VendorId` in the request body matching the path parameter.

**Related Endpoints:**
- [GET /api/v1.0/invoicing/vendors/\{id\}](/docs/api/invoicing/get-vendor-by-id) - Get current vendor details
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/invoicing/vendors/\{id\}](/docs/api/invoicing/delete-vendor) - Delete vendor

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"The unique identifier (UUID) of the vendor to update.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The updated vendor object. VendorId must match the path parameter.","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"A vendor in the invoicing system. Vendors represent external suppliers or service providers that can be associated with utility invoices.","properties":{"VendorId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the vendor."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"The site this vendor belongs to."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the vendor has been soft-deleted."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"The display name of the vendor."},"UtilityTypes":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"description":"List of utility types this vendor provides.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Defines a type of utility service (electricity, water, gas, etc.) that can be tracked in invoices.","properties":{"UtilityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for this utility type."},"ScopeId":{"type":"string","description":"Visibility scope for entities within the system.","enum":["System","Global","Site","Product"],"example":"Global","title":"Scopes"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Site this utility type is scoped to, if site-specific."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Product this utility type is associated with, if applicable."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the utility type (e.g., 'Electricity', 'Natural Gas')."},"Units":{"type":"string","description":"Unit of measurement for this utility type (e.g., 'kWh', 'Therms', 'Gallons')."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the utility type has been soft-deleted."}},"required":["Name"],"title":"VendorUtilityType"}},"Address":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Physical address information for a vendor.","properties":{"AddressId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for this address record."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"The site this address belongs to."},"Street1":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Primary street address line."},"Street2":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Secondary street address line (suite, building, etc.)."},"City":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"City name."},"State":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"State or province."},"Zip":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Postal or ZIP code."},"Country":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Country name or code."},"Latitude":{"type":"number","format":"double","nullable":true,"description":"Geographic latitude coordinate."},"Longitude":{"type":"number","format":"double","nullable":true,"description":"Geographic longitude coordinate."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the address has been soft-deleted."}},"title":"VendorAddress"}],"nullable":true,"type":"object","description":"The vendor's address information."},"Telephone":{"type":"string","description":"The vendor's contact telephone number."}},"title":"Vendor"},"example":{"VendorId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","SiteId":"bb6cece8-e4f4-e511-a789-005056bb000e","IsDeleted":false,"Name":"Demo Utility Provider (Updated)","Address":{"AddressId":"66666666-7777-8888-9999-000000000000","SiteId":"bb6cece8-e4f4-e511-a789-005056bb000e","Street1":"123 Demo Street","Street2":"Suite 200","City":"Demo City","State":"DC","Zip":"12345","Country":"USA"},"Telephone":"555-123-9999","UtilityTypes":[]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
